chinese: n.暴风雨，暴风雪 凶横冲直撞；突袭
english: storm

chinese: 这艘船在海上遭遇了暴风雨的袭击。
english: The ship was hit by a storm at sea

chinese: ad）. 著名的
english: renowned

chinese: 埃菲尔铁塔以其美丽简约而著名。
english: The Eiffel Tower is renowned for its beauty and simplicity

chinese: n.，单调乏味，无聊
english: monotony

chinese: 数学老师单调乏味的声音使这些学生昏昏欲睡。
english: The monotony of the math teacher's voice sent those students to sleep

chinese: n.润滑
english: lubrication

chinese: 机油为机器提供了润滑，减少了齿轮间的摩
english: Oil provides great lubrication for machines, reducing friction between the cogs

chinese: 凶参考，查看；归因于
english: refer

chinese: 在烹饪新菜时，我总要查阅烹饪书。
english: When cooking a new recipe, I always refer to the cookbook

chinese: D.开关
english: switch

chinese: 你家有这么多开关，哪一个能把灯打开？
english: There are so many switches in your home! Which one turns on the lights

chinese: ad）.有前途的，有希望的
english: promising

chinese: 我相信有了这些年轻有才的队员们，中国足球一定前途光明。
english: I believe Chinese football has a promising future with the young and talented players

chinese: V 操纵 血. 花招
english: maneuver

chinese: 这位熟练的飞行员可以很好地操纵直升机。
english: The skilled pilot can maneuver the helicopter very well

chinese: adj.足智多谋的
english: resourceful

chinese: 这位足智多谋的中国古代军事家"借"到了敌军的箭。
english: This resourceful ancient Chinese strategist reused the arrows of his enemies

chinese: 区乞求，恳求给予（帮助或金钱）
english: solicit

chinese: 如含，他没有了房子也没有了工作，他不得不向路人乞讨来维持生存。
english: Now, he had no house or job, he had to solicit help from strangers to survive

chinese: n.迁徙
english: migration

chinese: 食物匮乏导致了象群的迁徙。
english: Lack of food caused the migration of the elephants

chinese: n.宣告
english: announcement

chinese: 这对明星夫妻正式宣布了他们的婚事。
english: The famous couple made an official announcement about their marriage

chinese: n.定量配给 v.定量供应
english: ration

chinese: 每个人都得排队领取定量配给的口罩。
english: Everyone had to queue for their face mask ration

chinese: n.灭绝
english: extinction

chinese: 这类动物的灭绝发生在大约6600万年前。
english: The extinction of this animal occurred around 66 million years ago

chinese: ad）.音调悦耳的
english: melodious

chinese: 天使的歌曲很美妙动人。
english: The angel's song is pretty and melodious
